title: ğŸ“¢ Important Notice â€“ TikTok LIVE Policy Update (9/25/2025)
description:
ğŸ“¢ Important Notice â€“ TikTok LIVE Policy Update

TikTok does not allow static or low-quality LIVE streams. To stay compliant and protect your bonuses, follow these rules:

ğŸš« Whatâ€™s NOT Allowed

â€¢ LIVE with only a static or text image
â€¢ Poorly lit streams with no visible subject
â€¢ Fixed camera showing something that doesnâ€™t move
â€¢ Being in a multi-box LIVE but only showing a static image/profile pic
â€¢ Going LIVE with just an image or greenscreen and no visible interaction

âœ… What IS Required

â€¢ Show real movement & interaction at all times (talking, smiling, waving, dancing, cooking, etc.)
â€¢ If using a background/greenscreen, you must still be active and visible

âš ï¸ Violations = Penalties

â€¢ LIVE wonâ€™t be recommended or searchable
â€¢ Bonuses reduced or removed (Payout from TikTok)
â€¢ 6+ violations = removal from the network

ğŸ“ Appeals

â€¢ If flagged, you can appeal during the LIVE or within 3 days through TikTok operations

ğŸ‘‰ Bottom Line
Keep your LIVE active, moving, and engaging, donâ€™t just sit still or display an image.

âš ï¸ This is an official TikTok LIVE policy, not Infinitumâ€™s.

title: ğŸ‰ Stream 2 Diamonds (9/8/2024â€“9/23/2024)
description:
ğŸ‰ Stream 2 Diamonds Campaign

Duration: 14 days â†’ 09/08/2024 (00:00 PT) â€“ 09/21/2024 (23:59 PT)

Eligibility: Creators participate in livestreams, complete missions, and collect points.

Rewards: Diamonds, leaderboard ranking, and a chance to win iHeart Music Festival tickets.

ğŸ“Š Leaderboard & Ranking
Creators are split into four cohorts based on prior revenue & performance:

Jetsetter (400Kâ€“500K monthly revenue)
Voyager (300Kâ€“400K monthly revenue)
Explorer (200Kâ€“300K monthly revenue)
Navigator (multi-guest creators focus)

Rankings are weekly, based on total points from missions & bonus missions.
Leaderboards are public with username, profile pic, points, and ranking displayed.
TikTok may adjust points/rewards if errors or misconduct are detected.

ğŸš€ Daily Missions (per cohort)
ğŸ›© Jetsetter
â€¢ LIVE Match â‰¥ 20 min â†’ 100 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 20 Bounce Speaker gifts â†’ 300 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 1 Luxury Yacht gift â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Win 10 LIVE Matches â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)

ğŸš¢ Voyager
â€¢ LIVE Match â‰¥ 10 min â†’ 100 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 50 Cocktail gifts â†’ 300 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 1 Party Boat gift â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Win 8 LIVE Matches â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)

ğŸŒ´ Explorer
â€¢ LIVE Match â‰¥ 10 min â†’ 100 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 2 Pool Party gifts â†’ 300 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 2 Pool Party gifts â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Win 6 LIVE Matches â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)

ğŸ§­ Navigator
â€¢ Host 10 unique guests in group LIVE â†’ 100 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 20 Bounce Speaker gifts â†’ 300 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Receive 10 Watermelon gifts â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)
â€¢ Earn 23,000 diamonds from group LIVE gifts â†’ 500 pts (x5/day)

ğŸ Bonus Missions (weekly)
â€¢ Jetsetter: 10 Party Boat gifts in 7 days â†’ +5,000 pts
â€¢ Voyager: 10 Party Boat gifts in 7 days â†’ +5,000 pts
â€¢ Explorer: 10 Party Boat gifts in 7 days â†’ +5,000 pts
(Navigator does not have a Party Boat bonus mission)

Bonus missions can be completed once per week. Points are added to leaderboard totals.

ğŸ“Œ Key Rules
â€¢ Missions must be completed one at a time, in order.
â€¢ Max 1 completion per mission per day (repeatable up to 5x daily).
â€¢ Program runs strictly on Pacific Time (00:00â€“23:59 PT).
â€¢ Fraud, misconduct, or errors may result in loss of points/rewards.

âœ… In short: Creators are grouped by revenue tier and must complete daily/weekly missions like hosting battles, winning matches, and collecting specific gifts. Points drive leaderboard rankings, which determine rewards including diamonds and potential iHeart Festival tickets.

title: ğŸŒŸ September Spotlight (9/8/2024â€“10/5/2024)
description:
ğŸŒŸ September Spotlight Campaign

Dates: September 8, 2024 â€“ October 5, 2024
Goal: Top 60 creators earn diamonds + coupon promotion opportunities.

ğŸ® Leaderboard Gameplay
â€¢ 1 Like = 1 Point
â€¢ 1 Diamond = 10 Points
â€¢ 1 Like (while using Multi-guest/Co-host) = 5 Points
â€¢ 1 Comment (while using Multi-guest/Co-host) = 10 Points

ğŸ—“ï¸ Mission Types
ğŸ”¹ Daily Missions (20,000 pts total per day)
Each day you can complete up to 3 tasks (10,000 pts each):
â€¢ Go LIVE (time varies by tier)
â€¢ Visit Campaign Center
â€¢ Join/Host Multi-guest sessions (duration varies by tier)

ğŸ”¹ Weekly Missions (300,000 pts total per week)
Each week you can complete 3 tasks (100,000 pts each):
â€¢ Go LIVE for full days
â€¢ Receive at least 1 gift
â€¢ Use Multi-guest/Co-host a set number of times

âœ¨ Campaign Tiers
ğŸŒ± Bright Beginnings
Daily:
â€¢ Go LIVE 30 min â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Visit Campaign Center â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Join 1 Multi-guest (15 min) â†’ 10k pts
Weekly:
â€¢ Go LIVE 1 Day â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Receive 1 Gift â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Go LIVE w/ Multi-guest 2x â†’ 100k pts

ğŸŒŸ Rising Stars
Daily:
â€¢ Go LIVE 30â€“45 min â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Host/Join Multi-guest (15â€“30 min) â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Visit Campaign Center â†’ 10k pts
Weekly:
â€¢ Go LIVE 2 Days â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Receive 1 Gift â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Go LIVE w/ Multi-guest 3x â†’ 100k pts

ğŸŒŸ Shining Stars
Daily:
â€¢ Go LIVE 45â€“60 min â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Go LIVE w/ Multi-guest (1â€“2x) â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Join 1 Multi-guest (30â€“45 min) â†’ 10k pts
â€¢ Visit Campaign Center â†’ 10k pts
Weekly:
â€¢ Go LIVE multiple days â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Receive 1 Gift â†’ 100k pts
â€¢ Go LIVE using Multi-guest/Co-host multiple times â†’ 100k pts

âœ… How to Win
â€¢ Stream Daily â€“ hit daily missions for consistent 20,000 pts.
â€¢ Leverage Multi-guest/Co-host â€“ extra points for likes & comments during these.
â€¢ Collect Gifts Weekly â€“ even one gift secures huge points.
â€¢ Push for Full Days LIVE â€“ weekly streaks bring the biggest bonuses.
â€¢ Climb Rankings â€“ stay active across 4 weeks to land in the Top 60.

title: ğŸ“¢ Infinitum LIVE Public Service Announcement (8/7/2024)
description:
ğŸ“¢ Infinitum LIVE Public Service Announcement (8/7/2024)

ğŸ”’ Protecting Our Network â€“ Please Read Carefully

If you are contacted by any of the individuals or accounts listed below, please report it to Infinitum Management immediately at support@infinitumlive.com:

â€¢ @clarity.canada (formerly @clarity.cards) â€“ Former Infinitum team member  
â€¢ Ryan Brimm  
â€¢ @flowzone.agency  
â€¢ @fafniroverlord â€“ Former member  
â€¢ @chasingdreams75  
â€¢ Flow Zone Agency LLC â€“ A newly formed group following a separation from a prior affiliation with Infinitum LIVE

ğŸš¨ NOTICE  
We have received multiple reports indicating this group is engaged in activity that violates TikTok's Terms of Service and Infinitum LIVE's internal non-solicitation and professional conduct policies. These individuals no longer represent Infinitum in any capacity.

âš ï¸ Additionally, reports have outlined the following recurring concerns:
â€¢ Persistent misrepresentation of opportunities  
â€¢ Attempts to redirect creators from verified networks  
â€¢ Concerning patterns of emotionally manipulative communication

These behaviors have impacted creators' trust, safety, and earnings. We are actively investigating these issues and taking appropriate legal and contractual steps.

ğŸ” What You Should Do:
â€¢ Do not engage with messages or outreach from any listed accounts  
â€¢ Do not share sensitive, internal, or personal information  
â€¢ Forward any suspicious contact attempts to your manager or support@infinitumlive.com

We are fully committed to maintaining a secure, supportive, and ethical environment for all creators and partners. Thank you for your continued professionalism and vigilance in helping us protect this space.

title: ğŸ“¡ TikTok LIVE Match â€“ "Viewers Not Matched" Message Explained ğŸ“¡
description:
ğŸ“¡ **TikTok LIVE Match â€“ "Viewers Not Matched" Message Explained** ğŸ“¡

Hi Creators,

We wanted to clarify a common issue some of you may encounter during TikTok LIVE Matches: the **"Viewers Not Matched"** message. This appears when TikTok's algorithm is unable to pair you with another host for a LIVE battle due to insufficient overlap or compatibility between your audiences.

### Why This Happens:
â€¢ **Low Viewer Engagement** â€“ If there's minimal interaction on your stream, TikTok may not detect enough activity to create a successful match.
â€¢ **Audience Mismatch** â€“ Major differences in your audience's interests or behavior compared to the other host may prevent pairing.
â€¢ **Technical Glitches** â€“ Occasionally, the issue may stem from platform bugs or connection problems.

In most cases, this simply means your viewers were not engaging enough at the time of the match. We encourage you to keep promoting active interaction during your streams to improve match success!

Stay consistent, stay creative, and keep going LIVE ğŸ’

â€“ Infinitum LIVE Creator Network

title: ğŸ“£ Infinitum Policy Update: Box Battles & Guest Boxes
description:
ğŸ“¢ **Official PSA â€” Policy on Box Battles & Guest Box Participation**

Effective immediately, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network will **not** join or moderate any battle-box or box-battle events hosted by accounts outside our network. Additionally, Infinitum will no longer schedule or promote battle-box sessions of our own.

**Why this change matters**
1. **Earnings Impact** â€“ Battle-box revenue now diverts a larger share to the host, so you earn **significantly less** than in standard 1-to-1 battles or solo LIVE sessions.
2. **Monthly LIVE-Time Compliance** â€“ Minutes spent as a *guest* in someone else's box **do not count** toward Infinitum's required monthly LIVE-time thresholds. Only hours streamed from your own host window are credited.
3. **Algorithmic Performance** â€“ Appearing in boxesâ€”especially when cameras are switched offâ€”lowers viewer retention and **suppresses your reach on the For You Page**.
4. **Brand & Viewer Experience** â€“ Camera-off boxes hurt professionalism and viewer trust.

**Infinitum's stance**
â€¢ We **do not encourage** participation in box battles under current payout and visibility conditions.
â€¢ We **will not** enter external battles to push scores, gifts, or rankings.
â€¢ We **will continue** supporting your growth through coaching, strategic 1-to-1 battles, goal tracking, and high-value LIVE formats that maximize diamonds and audience retention.

**Your next steps**
â€¢ Focus on **solo or 1-to-1 battles** hosted from your own account.
â€¢ Maintain **camera-on, high-quality streams** to drive algorithmic favorability.
â€¢ Track your hours in InfiniVIEW to ensure they count toward monthly targets.
â€¢ Direct questions to your Creator Network Manager or open a ticket in the "LIVE Support" Discord channel.

title: Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain Is LIVE! ğŸ”
description:
Hey Creators â€”

Big news. We're launching something game-changing for our TikTok LIVE family... ğŸ¥ğŸ”¥

Introducing the Infinitum LIVE TikTok Raid Chain â€“ a community-powered, momentum-building experience where we pass viewers from one creator to the nextâ€”just like Twitch raids, but made for us and made for TikTok.

ğŸš€ What's a TikTok Raid?
It's simple:
We go live back-to-back, each for 1 hour and 1 minute, and at the end of each session, you shout out the next creator and send your viewers their way.

This means:
â€¢ More eyes on your content
â€¢ More chances to go viral together
â€¢ And a tighter, more powerful creator network âœŠ

ğŸ§  How It Works:
1. You sign up for a time slot (link below).
2. You go live on TikTok at your scheduled time.
3. At the 60-minute mark:
   â€¢ Shout out the next creator
   â€¢ Pin their @handle or LIVE link in your chat
   â€¢ Encourage your viewers to "RAID" over to their stream
   â€¢ End your stream at 1 hour and 1 minute.

That's it. Your job is done, and the next creator keeps the fire going ğŸ”¥

ğŸ“… Why Join the Raid Chain?
â€¢ Grow your LIVE audience naturally
â€¢ Get discovered by other creators' communities
â€¢ Be part of a daily content wave that TikTok's algorithm loves
â€¢ Support each other and show the world what creator collaboration really looks like

âœ… What You Need to Do Now:
ğŸ“¥ Sign up here: https://forms.gle/n57LtAEJnXwbbYtv5
ğŸ§­ Make sure your TikTok profile is set up for LIVE (must meet platform requirements)
ğŸ“¢ Be ready to go live, support your fellow creators, and have fun with it!

ğŸ’¡ Pro Tip:
Want to stand out? Use your stream to hype up the next creator with energy, vibes, or a mini countdown before your handoff. Show the viewers it's all connected ğŸ’«

Let's raid. Let's grow. Let's GO.

#InfinitumLIVE #TikTokRaidChain #CreatorFamily #SupportCreators

title: Important Reminder to All Infinitum LIVE Creators ğŸ“£
description:
Dear Creators,

We want to take a moment to thank you for your continued trust and dedication as a member of the Infinitum LIVE Creator Network. Our community thrives because of your commitment, creativity, and loyalty â€” and we are proud to support you every step of the way.

However, it has come to our attention that some creators have been contacted by outside networks or individuals attempting to poach or lure creators away from our community. Please understand:

ğŸ”’ This is a direct violation of both TikTok LIVE policy and your agreement with Infinitum LIVE Creator Network.

â— Entertaining offers, conversations, or invitations from other networks while contracted with Infinitum is strictly prohibited. These actions are not only a breach of contract, but they can result in serious consequences for both the creator and the violating network.

ğŸš« If You Leave Due to Poaching:
The violating agency will be reported to TikTok.
That agency will receive violation points, which may lead to the termination of their agency status with TikTok.
Infinitum will pursue legal action against any individual or entity who violates our agreements or attempts to disrupt the integrity of our network.

ğŸš« If a Creator in Our Network Starts Their Own Agency:
This is a breach of contract and will result in termination from Infinitum LIVE.
It will also trigger legal enforcement actions, including possible claims for damages, as outlined in the agreement you signed.

We do not take these matters lightly. Our contracts are legally binding, enforceable, and designed to protect the time, effort, and trust we all put into this network.

ğŸ¤ Need Help or Have Questions?
If you're ever unsure, uncomfortable, or just need support â€” please reach out to your assigned manager or email us directly at support@infinitumlive.com. We are here for you. Always.

Thank you again for being a valued part of the Infinitum family. Together, we grow stronger. ğŸ’

â€” Infinitum LIVE Creator Network
Owned and operated by creators, for creators.

How to Win

Make It to the Top
Every regular Diamond is worth 1 point, and every match Diamond is worth 2 points. We're competing hard to secure a Top 3 spot ğŸ’¯ and claim those rewards for our leading creators.

Get Ready

title: Apply as Mentor to prove yourself to become a manager!
description:
Mentor Qualification Checklist â€“ Path to Becoming a Manager

Trial Period: 1 Month (3 Month Maximum time to complete) (Compensation: $20 per creator who meets the requirements)

To successfully transition from a mentor to a manager, you must complete the following:

Recruitment: Enroll a minimum of 20 new creators into the network. [Apply here](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

Performance Goals: At least 3 out of the 20 recruited creators must achieve:
â€¢ 10 valid days
â€¢ 20 hours of live streaming
â€¢ 100,000 diamonds

Creator Development: Actively collaborate with your recruits to identify areas for growth and provide strategic guidance to help them improve their performance on LIVE.

Support & Resources: Ensure creators receive the necessary support by providing them with relevant documents, guides, and materials from our Discord community.

Mentor Requirement: Must complete 7 valid days and 15 hours a month on their own personal account each month.

### Transition to Manager Role

Once you successfully transition to a manager, you will be sent the Official Creator Agreement and the Manager Pay Policy, outlining your responsibilities, compensation, and additional benefits as a manager.

[Apply here](https://forms.gle/kqkr3jrRkZZbrBnU6):

title: TikTok LIVE - Understanding 1099-K Tax Forms
description: The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) requires US payment processors, including TikTok Inc., to file and send you a 1099-K if the payment processor has transferred more than $20000 and 200 transactions to you during the year. Otherwise check your paypal for Tax forms.

title: HIGH-END RECRUITING BONUS (FEB-MARCH 2024)
description:
**MARK: Documentation Overview**

- **Active Recruit:** Indicates whether the recruiter status is active (YES or NO).
- **Tier:** Designates the level or rank (e.g., Rookie).
- **Valid Days:** Total number of days that the current status remains valid (e.g., 7).
- **Hours:** Represents allotted or tracked hours during the valid period (e.g., 15).
- **Diamonds REQ:** Specifies the required diamonds or points (e.g., 20,000).
- **Pay:** Denotes the monetary payout for this tier and status (e.g., $10).

**Sample Entry:**
- Active Recruit: YES
- Tier: Rookie
- Valid Days: 7
- Hours: 15
- Diamonds REQ: 20,000
- Pay: $10 (1,000 diamonds)

Have them apply here: [Apply Now](https://infinitumlive.com/creator-pre-check/)

title: Increase Creator Earnings & Recharge Incentives with Infinitum!
description:
This initiative can significantly benefit the creators in by boosting recharge rates and giving creators a strong incentive to reactivate Gifters and extend your Go-LIVE duration.

We've always known that web recharge offers discounted Coins, but now, for the first time, Infinitum LIVE Creator Network members can receive additional compensation directly from the referrals to tiktok.com/coin that your creators generate.

**How Creator Networks Can Maximize This Opportunity:**

âœ… Encourage creators to leverage the campaign â€“ They can increase their earnings while their supporters enjoy exclusive discounts.
âœ… Utilize top-performing creators to educate â€“ Posting educational content about web recharge can boost commissions and create long-term recharge habits for Gifters, strengthening their support for creators.

**Suggested Creator Script:**

ğŸ”¹ From now until March 9, you can recharge at tiktok.com/coin and get 25% off Coins + 1-5% cashback!
ğŸ”¹ Use my referral code to support my streams or if this was helpful!
ğŸ”¹ Add tiktok.com/coin as a shortcut on your phone, recharge from there, and receive a 10% cashback coupon for future recharges!

ğŸ“Œ **How to add the shortcut:**
1ï¸âƒ£ Go to tiktok.com/coin in your web browser.
2ï¸âƒ£ Click the share icon (on iOS) or menu icon (on Android).
3ï¸âƒ£ Select "Add to Home Screen" and save it.
4ï¸âƒ£ Use the new shortcut for easy recharges and cashback!

**Video Content Ideas for Creators:**

ğŸ¥ Green Screen â€“ Show step-by-step instructions on how to recharge.
ğŸ‘¥ Collab with affiliates & brand spokespeople â€“ Expand reach and engagement.
ğŸ“² Use Promote Coupons â€“ Boost visibility on TikTok.
ğŸ“Œ Post across multiple platforms â€“ Use pinned comments for more visibility.
ğŸ’¡ Authenticity wins! â€“ Engage naturally rather than sounding scripted.

Let's maximize earnings and keep our creators thriving! ğŸš€ğŸ’

title: [New] Team Match Mode Coming Soon
description:
Go 1v2 or 1v3 with other creators using *team match!

Hi everyone! We have exciting new team match combinationsâ€”1v2 and 1v3â€”currently being tested on TikTok LIVE. 90% of creators will have access starting today (2.13) and we anticipate all creators to have access before the end of February.

For more information on accessing the new team match combinations and a preview of the UI, check out the attached one-pager.

Feel free to share any questions or feedback you may have or receive on this new match mode! We're eager to continue optimizing and improving the match experience on TikTok LIVE.

**FAQ:**

**Q:** I do not have access to new team match modes. When will I receive access?

**A:** We anticipate you will receive access in the next 2 weeks, before the end of February!

**Q:** Do 1v2 or 1v3 wins count towards a match win streak?

**A:** Currently, team match wins do not count towards a win streak. However, we are working on updating this capability in the future.
